name: Adirondack Flying Service
about: Adirondack Flying Service, located in Lake Placid, NY, has been a cornerstone of aviation in the Adirondack Region for over 40 years. We offer a range of services including scenic air tours, charter flights, and flight instruction. Our scenic flights, available in 20 and 45-minute durations, as well as sunrise and sunset tours, provide breathtaking aerial views of the Adirondacks, including the Saranac Chain of Lakes and the Olympic venues. As a full-time flight school, Adirondack Aviation Academy, we also provide flight instruction, from introductory lessons to full private pilot licenses. Our commitment to safety and customer satisfaction makes us the go-to choice for both recreational and instructional aviation needs in the region. Whether you're seeking a memorable scenic tour or pursuing a career in aviation, Adirondack Flying Service is here to serve you.
